info.author: Shawn Sulma
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description: Terbium is a small Python application that turns a directory structure of image and media files into a web-browseable gallery. It generates .html files in a self-contained hierarchy, which makes it a good candidate for browseable CD/DVDs of images and media files, or for online hosted galleries that do not need fancy validation, authentication or access patterns.
info.name: terbium
info.html_description: Terbium is a small Python application that turns a directory structure of image and media files into a web-browseable gallery. It generates .html files in a self-contained hierarchy, which makes it a good candidate for browseable CD/DVDs of images and media files, or for online hosted galleries that do not need fancy validation, authentication or access patterns.
